text: Edward Tevis Wheeler (born August 31, 1962) is an American politician. He is the current mayor of Portland, Oregon. He was Oregon State Treasurer. He was appointed on March 9, 2010, to replace Ben Westlund, who died in office. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Portland, Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ted Wheeler
